INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: The Siroko Sidney bike is an elegant and versatile choice for cycling enthusiasts. With an aerodynamic design and an aluminum alloy frame, it delivers agile performance on both urban terrains and trails.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Equipped with a smooth and precise gear system, the Siroko provides cyclists with the ability to adapt to different terrain conditions.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: Furthermore, its high-quality braking system ensures a safe and efficient response. Perfect for adventure lovers and urban mobility.
BIKE_DESCRIPTION: Now you have all you need for your city rides with Siroko.
PREFOOTER_VIDEO_TITLE: EVOLUTION - SIROKO SIDNEY, THE NEW URBAN BIKE
